saying: Wish us a long life to share the beauty of this graceful moonlight, even thousands miles apart.
author: 苏轼 (1037/1/8 － 1101/8/24)
chinese: 但愿人长久，千里共婵娟

saying: Coming events cast their shadows before them.
author: 许浑 (around 791 - around 858)

saying: Catch one’s heart, never be apart.
author: 葛洪 (283 － 343)
chinese: 愿得一人心，白首不相离

saying: Learning without thought means labour lost; thought without learning is perilous.
author: Confucius (551/9/28 BC - 479 BC)
chinese: 学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆
